data.title: Amitabh Bachchan reveals his look test from Reshma Aur Shera, fans think it's Sonu Sood
data.meta_description: Amitabh Bachchan has shared his look test from Reshma Aur Shera. Fans are however left confused if it is Sonu Sood.
data.text:
Amitabh Bachchan often shares pictures from days gone by. The veteran actor is an active social media user and fans eagerly wait for his interesting and adorable posts. On Sunday (July 18), he shared a picture from 1969. It was his look test for the 1971 film Reshma Aur Shera. Now, fans are confused if that is Sonu Sood.

advertisement

AMITABH BACHCHAN SHARES LOOK TEST FROM RESHMA AUR SHERA

Amitabh Bachchan who will next be seen in Goodbye, has shared a throwback snap from 1969. The actor can be seen dressed in a turban and a Rajasthani kurta as he gave the look test for Reshma Aur Shera, which was released two years later in 1971. Big B took the captions and revealed that he was actually selected after giving the look test for the film.

Along with the picture he wrote, "my look test for film “Reshma aur Shera” .. 1969 .. I actually got selected !!(sic)."

Fans, however, could not help but compare a young Amitabh Bachchan with Bollywood actor Sonu Sood. Many netizens took to social media and shared that at first, they thought this was Sonu Sood. "Who thought its Sonu Sood at first glance (sic)," read one users' comment. Another netizen wrote, "Great picture sir.. you are looking like Sonu Sood sir..(sic)."

Read all comments here

For the uninitiated, Amitabh Bachchan played the role of Sonu Sood's father in 2011 film Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap.

ABOUT RESHMA AUR SHERA

Reshma Aur Shera is a 1971 Hindi film produced and directed by Sunil Dutt. He also starred in the film along with Waheeda Rehman, Vinod Khanna, Amitabh Bachchan, Raakhee, Ranjeet, K.N. Singh, Jayant and Amrish Puri in pivotal roles.

This film also happened to mark Sanjay Dutt's first appearance on the big screen. He was just 12 years old back then.

AMITABH BACHCAN'S LOOK FROM GOODBYE GETS LEAKED

Amitabh Bachchan had been shooting for his upcoming film Goodbye in Mumbai. The actor's look from the film got leaked. In the picture, the actor is seen wearing a half-jacket and a pink shirt. We can also spot Rashmika Mandanna in the leaked snap.

Produced by Ekta Kapoor, Goodbye is directed by Vikas Bahl and also stars Shivin Narang and Pavail Gulati in important roles.
